com.paydiant.android.core.service

Class DeviceManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.service.DeviceManagerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDeviceManagerService, IDevicePropertyCodes

    public class DeviceManagerService
extends Object
implements IDeviceManagerService, IDevicePropertyCodes
    The service implementation of the device service interface. This device service implementation will abstract the device related services and properties needed by the Paydiant SDK running on a platform not before than 1.6.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

      • setDeviceDescription

        public void setDeviceDescription()
        Description copied from interface: IDeviceManagerService
        Sets the device model as device description. (Relative to device name in iphone). This would be displayed on the customer portal instead of the device unique id (IMEI).
        Specified by:
        setDeviceDescription in interface IDeviceManagerService
